org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.api

Class EEFTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.api.EEFTab

  • public class EEFTab
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as the entry point to manage a tab with EEF.
